comment: Alternate definition of the function relation predicate, cf. ~ dfdisjALTV4 . This is ~ dffun6 . For the ` X ` axis and the ` Y ` axis you can convert the right side to ` ( A. x1 E* y1 x1 F y1 /\ Rel F ) ` . (Contributed by NM, 9-Mar-1995.)
